
Changelog
=========


1.1.0 (2016-05-06)
------------------

* Removed debug print.
* Added ``--interval`` option for how often to check. No more spinloops.

1.0.0 (2016-04-22)
------------------

* Improved tests.
* Always log to stderr.

0.1.0 (2016-04-21)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
